author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-2484: RecipientList now acquires and releases producers from ProducerCache. Also fixed memory issue when using Mina or FTP producers with recipientList. Fixed LRUCache to stop its cached services when its stopped to better release resources when Camel is stopped.
